ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.display

Class OdometryDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.display.OdometryDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class OdometryDisplay
extends java.lang.Thread
    Displays robot X, Y, and Theta positional parameters on LCD. This class was made a thread as we did not want it to momentarly stop or have to call a method constantly in other classes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

      • formattedDoubleToString

        private static java.lang.String formattedDoubleToString(double x,
                                                        int places)
        Converts numeric positions into string to display on LCD of robot.
        Parameters:
        x - parameter corresponding to either x, y, or theta position of robot.
        places - index of parameter within array storing position of robot
